item.title: Writing Scala programs with IntelliJ Idea
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: Download the community version from JetBrains web site or install it from the distro repository: # pacman -S intellij-idea-community-edition At the first time it is executed: Customize any configurations. Install the official scala plug-in. Install the additional plug-in scalariform. After the initial setup, go to File -> Settings -> Keymap and search for scalariform and change its shortcut to Ctrl+Shift+S.
